articles.title: India Approves Crypto Exchanges Binance and Kucoin as Registered Virtual Asset Service Providers – Regulation Bitcoin News - Bitcoin.com News
articles.description: Crypto exchanges Binance and Kucoin have successfully registered with India's Financial Intelligence Unit as Virtual Asset Service Providers.
